entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generic attributes lack testing #73735
  • jit\\regression\\jitblue\\runtime_60035\\runtime_60035\\runtime_60035.cmd #73728
  • Reenable MSQuic subscription into main after .NET 7 fork #73726
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.ComponentModel #73724
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ArgumentNullException.ParamName is missing #73723
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Data #73722
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Some IO tests failing on Windows/NodeJS #73721
    7.0.0
  • illegal read of byte preceding an automatic (stack allocate) variable #73718
  • Issue using `dotnet trace` on MacCatalyst apps #73715
  • Share serialization tests between source-gen and reflection JsonSerializer #73714
    8.0.0
  • Consider failing early when (de)serializing enum values that contain commas #73712
    8.0.0
  • Building clr shouldn't build host tests #73711
  • Can't get assembly probing to work; not sure why. #73710
  • [API Proposal]: Add a property or method that can be used to check if there is an error in the process #73709
  • PerformanceCounters do not support config entry for 'filemappingsize' #73706
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list reconstructed for every call to IsBypassed #73703
    Future
  • NativeAOT test ` ThreadLocalStatics.TLSTesting.ThreadLocalStatics_Test` failing on OSX/x64 #73698
  • [NativeAOT] Randomizing guard stack cookie not supported on some Unix platforms #73695
  • Assert: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_27924\\GitHub_27924\\GitHub_27924.cmd - slot_table[slot_index] == nullptr #73692
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Consider implementing send buffering on .NET side #73691
    8.0.0
  • Bug in the .NET Blog https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/ #73690
  • [QUIC] Abort on cancellation throws QUIC_STATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER #73688
  • Repoint URL's to docs from corefx to runtime repo #73682
  • Unnecessary(?) runtime lookups for constrained interface calls #73681
    7.0.0
  • `slot_table[slot_index] == nullptr` - dynamic atexit destructor for 'WKS::gc_heap::mark_queue #73679
    7.0.0
  • Improve experience when using PublishAot with unsupported RID #73678
    7.0.0
  • HttpListener Stack over flow #73674
  • [wasm] Regression: Crash on running debugger tests on Codespaces #73673
    7.0.0
  • Accessing physical drives throws when accessing from the end and retrieving .Length #73669
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regressions in System.ConsoleTests.Perf_Console and Perf_BitOperations #67598
    7.0.0
  • Out of memory exception in JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294 #8034
    Future
  • [RyuJit/R2R/JitStress=1] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\DevDiv_255294 fails with timeout. #9810
    Future
  • stop runtime maestro from consuming dotnet/msquic #73645
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource doesn't read configuration from App.config in .NET Core? #23937
    7.0.0
  • Freeze/lock of dotnet process in net 5 mac #60252
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.BigIntegerConstructorTest.RunCtorSingleTests #70761
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match #70645
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: support System.Diagnostics.TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file. #72967
    7.0.0
  • `Internal CLR error. (0x80131506)` in `System.Reflection.InvokeInterpreted.Tests` on `coreclr windows x64 Release` #73453
  • Add libclang to Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.Mono.LLVM.Sdk package #62485
    7.0.0
  • Polymorphic Serialization - Doesn't allow typeDiscriminator to be anything but first #73693
  • Inconsistent stack trace with .NET 7 preview 5 #70940
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.Tests fails on Android #50566
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout.cmd #73668
  • `Console.ReadKey` returns incomplete VT sequences for bracketed paste #60101
    7.0.0
  • From issue #65696. #73635
  • Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' (IL size 129) #65311
    7.0.0
  • ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test failure on Android #43754
    7.0.0
  • Consider making Visual Studio's CMake integration work with CMake projects within the repo #40049
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeSimpleExpr1\\hugeSimpleExpr1.cmd #73545
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp(offlineContext: False) #71037
    7.0.0
  • Each nativefilereference causes 512+mb to be allocated #62736
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Review generated js binding code urls #71727
    7.0.0
  • React to ref escape changes in interpolated string handlers #73642
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] CONNECTION_TIMEOUT may be misreported as IDLE_TIMEOUT #73229
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests failure on win-arm64 with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #72364
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Random Application Hangs at Task.Run #73590
  • Possible SerialPort memory leak on Raspbian (all Unix?) #55146
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest #73667
  • area-ILTools-coreclr ilasm.exe failing - Failed to add user string using DefineUserString, hr=0x80131198, data: 'presence' #73656
  • NativeAOT compiler crash with NRE #70952
    7.0.0
  • Tar crashes on reading the specific file #73440
    Future
  • Test faliure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #73672
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables 6.0.1 fails reading environment variables #73570
    6.0.x
  • Change the `cpu-usage` EventCounter from int to double #62525
    7.0.0
  • crash in the application #70886
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix component model aot test #73734
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update all of the net 6 packs to be labeled .net6 #73733
  • Disable gcstress on osx-x64 #73732
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #73731
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer on the async writer wrapper. #73730
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • 66163 fatal error xml serializer immutable array #73729
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • consume Debian images with updated msquic #73727
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Move the XML comments from reference assembly to CoreCLR implementation #73725
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Ensure partial Vector256 acceleration is still possible on AVX only hardware #73720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: extend forward sub to local fields #73719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Properly encode small structs in bitcasts #73717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [libs] Remove JitInfoIsPopulated mobile activeissue #73716
    area-System.Runtime, os-android, os-ios, os-tvos
  • consume MsQuic 2.1 for windows ARM64 builds #73713
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Handle Stream.Length for devices #73708
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • consume fedora images with msquic updated to 2.1 #73707
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #73705
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [wasm] fix error cases in assets loading #73702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept for four values #73696
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't inflate Mono.ValueTuple with byrefs #73689
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix NRT annotations for XmlProcessingInstruction #73687
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove executable bits from generated shared libs #73686
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • #51393 removed activeissue from not supported platforms #73684
    area-System.IO, needs-author-action
  • Don't excessively generate default constructors #73683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HTTP3] Correctly handle server closing a control stream #73680
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove [RequiresPreviewFeatures] from System.Security.Cryptography.Cose #73677
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete XmlSecureResolver #73676
    Security, area-System.Xml, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Copy default value back when Missing.Value is provided as argument #73670
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Handle the case when pid replacement is not needed #73664
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Disable failing JIT.Directed test #73704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept<T>(T value) #73488
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable Dop_WorkersCreatedRespectingLimitAndTaskScheduler_Sync test #73486
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Remove unused thumb2_supported variable in mini-arm.c #73701
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, arm64, 7.0.0
  • Fix up doc comments #73597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Android] Enable ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test #73487
    area-System.Threading
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.NarrowUtf16ToAscii to x-plat intrinsics #73064
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Initialize main thread to MTA by default in NativeAOT #73659
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILASM - Roundtrip fix for 'poison' and 'hugeSimpleExpr1' #73648
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Bump TraceEventVersion to 3.0.3 #71813
  • Use SSL_ctrl instead of SSL_CTX_ctrl to enable client OCSP stapling #73627
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #73662
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder" #73671
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Add `scoped` keyword where needed on interpolated string handlers #73665
    area-Meta
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update dotnet/msquic ref to release/7.0 #73641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix Android x86 Debug build of pal_ifaddrs.c #73685
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update javascript API usage in samples and tests #73367
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update MsQuic and use ConnectionCloseStatus in StreamShutdown #73563
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix preinit of types placing the same value in two fields #73605
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAot] Triage another 14 libs tests #73442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support managed debugging when CET is enabled #73572
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use JitStdOutFile for .dasm file creation #73638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Expand NativeAOT testing platforms #73546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure BitIncrement/BitDecrement for Half works correctly #73631
    area-System.Numerics
  • Utilize Kernel Samepage Merging #71312
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Remove non-determinism from R2R field access #73663
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add logging callback to DAC EnumMemoryRegion API #73599
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • shortcut string replace if oldvalue is longer than count #73543
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, Future
  • Initialize variable prior to pedantic use. Caught by ubsan on a bool. #73626
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove [Serializable] from OptionException #73316
    arch-wasm, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Add markdown readme for System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #72772
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Get rid of more .NET Nativisms #73612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Verify correctness of using mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix a couple issues with Microsoft.XmlSerailizer.Generator #73550
    area-Serialization
  • Honor naming policy for string enum deserialization #73348
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • To keep ubsan happy, Use offsetof() rather than legacy equivalent #73657
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #72258
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Account for availability of multiple processor groups on Windows 11+ #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui builds to use dotnet rc1 and new dotnet version flow #73624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix #70391 #73654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port IndexOfAny(ref char, char[1-5], int) to Vector128/256 #73469
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73481
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Port SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(ref byte, int, ref byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73475
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73556
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [Ppc64le] Added memory patch thunking for function calls #73616
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock fix #73537
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/tcp stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Log as warning in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
